constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL Name: MC1  Maldens and Coombe
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

description: Non material amendment to planning application ref 18/14306/FUL (Erection of 2 x 3 storey 4 bedroom semi-detached dwellings) dated 08/08/2018, amendments to consist of changes to materials - red brick up to first floor level, white render up to eaves, brick soldier course. Detail added to head of doors and windows at ground level. Dormers - the roof of two approved dormers on the front elevation has been amended to flat hipped. Bays - approved gables to be amended to hipped roofs. West elevation - 1 no. doors added. number of velux's reduced. Number of first floor windows reduced, 3 no. windows added at ground level. East Elevation - fenestration added.
decision_conditions: The Council considers the proposed amendments to be material and as such it is recommended that this application is refused.

The assessment of this application is based on measurements taken from the submitted drawings / plans. If it transpires that the drawings / plans submitted are incorrect this would nullify the validity of this decision and you are advised to submit a fresh application with the correct information / drawings.

Work description povided "Retention of the slanted roof over the side extension" does not match with application form question "Has the work already been started without consent?" Answer "No" was provided. Please clarify.
